lead_paragraph: In 1999, Jaime Correal Martinz was captured and held for eight months. The ordeal cost him everything, but before he died in June he hoped for peace.

headline.print_headline: Remembering a Victim of Colombia’s War: My Father
headline.main: A Reporter Recalls One of the Many Victims of Colombia’s War: Her Father

snippet: In 1999, Jaime Correal Martinz was captured and held for eight months. The ordeal cost him everything, but before he died in June he hoped for peace....
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; Annie Correal examines complexity of peace deal referendum in Columbia for citizens whose lives have been upended by actions of Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC; notes many fighters will be granted amnesty or reduced punishment for drug trafficking, kidnapping and executions under deal; recounts her father's kidnapping by group and effect on her family.
